amendment.description: An amendment numbered 50 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to implement, administer, or enforce any Federal law, rule, or regulation that would require an individual to wear a mask on public transportation conveyances and at transportation hubs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fry amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fry amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fry amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
